document_data.mainbody:
inrae was a bartender and cook of Swordsfall House, a shraehouse (a small restaurant/tavern), in the city of Silverymoon in the Silver Marches in the late 14 century DR. Around 1372 DR, she was a kindly woman of middle years.
She spent time with Chesmyr Morrowynd, a regular at Swordsfall, and one night showed him how to make thaevor potatoes.
